NetworkMetaAnalysis 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

computePairwiseEstimates()

Compute all pairwise estimates

computeRankProbabilities()

Compute the rank probabilities

computeRhat()

Compute the Rhat statistic for a given fit

computeSucra()

Compute SUCRA estimates

deriveEdges()

Use to prepare data needed to draw the edges of the network

deriveNodes()

Deriving node data for drawing the network

fetchParameterSummaries()

Table of parameter estimates and deviance statistics for reconciled results

fetchPosteriorDraws()

Fetches and tidies the posterior draws

fetchTcoEstimates()

Load target-comparator-outcome estimates from server

fetchTidyNodesplitResults()

Get the node-splitting analyses results in tidy format

fitNetwork()

Run model on network to estimate parameters

launchShinyApp()

Launch a Shiny app to explore the results

loadFromDb()

Loads results stored in a database following its data model

plotForest()

Draw forest plot of total network estimates

plotNetwork()

Visualise network

plotNodesplitResults()

Visualise results of node-splitting analysis

plotPairwiseEstimates()

Creates a heatmap plot of all pairwise estimates

plotPosteriorDensities()

Produces density plots of parameter estimates from the fitted models

plotRankogram()

Rank treatments by effectiveness

plotRhat()

Plot the Rhat values of the fitted model

plotTraces()

Produces density plots of parameter estimates from the fitted models

runAnalyses()

Runs the analysis and returns results ready to be stored in database or used directly

saveToDatabase()

Saves the reconciled results to database
